name: OR_CASE_INF_STAT
description: The OR_CASE_INF_STAT table contains OR management system case patient infection status.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the infection status information for the case.

columns.name: INFECTION_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the type of infection status associated with the patient in the case.
